QuestData.Title: Can't Hear A Thing
QuestData.Description:
These snake wenches show up and everyone loses their minds! All my men are head over heels for these things. Personally, I don't see it. I mean, I sort of get the appeal, but the wings for arms and snake tails are a big turn off.
There's a big one in a cave to the east. She's got a whole heap of suitors. I need them back to work. Go give her a wallop and get everyone back here.
QuestData.CompletionText: Guess beauty is in the eye of the beholder?
QuestData.RewardText: I decided if you can't beat 'em, join 'em! That one over there looks available. Think she'll go out with me?$B$BOh, and thanks for getting everyone back at their posts. We got a lot of cleanup.
